Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball had an incredible finish at the rim that got a lot of views on social media.
Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets are just 3-5 in their first eight games of the new season.
As for the Pacers, they are 4-4 in their first eight games of the new season.
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets won by a score of 103-83.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball is off to an excellent start to the season with averages of 28.1 points, 4.8 rebounds, 6.0 assists and 1.5 steals per contest while shooting 46.2% from the field and 39.4% from the three-point range in eight games.
Others: The Hornets will play their next game on Sunday evening when they visit Paul George and the Philadelphia 76ers.
The Pacers will play their next game on Sunday evening when they return home to host Jalen Brunson and the New York Knicks in Indiana.
